# init(_:_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a gesture with two gestures that can receive updates or succeed independently of each other.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ first: First, _ second: Second)
```

## Parameters

- **first**: The first of two gestures that can happen simultaneously.
- **second**: The second of two gestures that can happen simultaneously.

## Creating the gesture

- **first**: The first of two gestures that can happen simultaneously.
- **second**: The second of two gestures that can happen simultaneously.

items.description: The first of two gestures that can happen simultaneously.
items.name: first

items.description: The second of two gestures that can happen simultaneously.
items.name: second
